html:
2.22.19  6:23 pm   Do you think the word almost has been overused to the point where the word has lost some of its meaning and power?

     no, i think it's a tireless classic. seems to be more powerful than ever

2.22.19  5:26 pm   What's the difference between absolute and perfect pitch?

     'perfect pitch' means absolute pitch but i think it's a misleading name. i think 'perfect pitch' is a misleading name for absolute pitch because it sounds like it means 'having a perfect sense of pitch' like knowing if something is in tune or not. but that's not quite what absolute pitch means. absolute pitch is a very non musical ability, and there is shockingly little crossover between great musicianship and great absolute pitch. absolute pitch means you can tell if the note you're hearing now is in tune with some other note you heard in your childhood. but what really counts in music is whether you can tell if a note you're hearing now is in tune with other notes that are also happening now

2.22.19  5:19 pm   what's a quick trick to make a melody sound more powerful?

     try adding some explosive dynamite onto just one piece of it but not the rest. create a sort of game of peek a boo

2.22.19  5:14 pm   I just bought an electric bass, with the intention of auditioning for my school's jazz band in 7 months. This is obviously not a whole lot of time. Can you think of any specific resources that might be helpful, or even just general tips/tricks?

     figure out who is in charge of the group and make fast friends with them. if you wanna learn anything on your instrument you're gonna need to get into that band. all the learning happens after that point

2.22.19  5:08 pm   how do i debate with a squirrel? 

     question their squirrelcy

2.22.19  5:00 pm   How to get a superpower?

     you already have almost all of them

2.22.19  2:54 pm   Can I order you a pizza?

     sure

      What toppings do you want?

     can you put something underneath

2.22.19  2:18 pm   aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

     that's true

2.22.19  1:47 pm   perfectionism forgets that everything we ever loved is deeply imperfect

     that's true

2.22.19  1:28 pm   what music do you listen to when you're making music?

     the music being made

2.22.19  1:12 pm   I was trying to write music without thinking about chords because if I do I always write the same boring stuff, but I end up thinking too much about them anyway. Can you suggest me a strategy?

     you could write the entire melody first. then go through and figure out what chords make that melody the strongest version of itself

2.22.19  12:57 pm   why do we exist?

     anything does

     who decided that 

     you

2.22.19  11:56 am   ever just wanna move to a cabin by a lake and think about how life works

     how about just move into the lake

2.22.19  10:31 am   how do you stay dedicated to your schedule?

     as of yet, my schedule is just outside the bounds of my ability. so the first step would be to get some more ability, i guess. then i can look forward to potentially achieving the schedule for the first time

2.22.19  9:48 am   Whenever I try to create harmonies with my melodies, I'm always stuck to using common progressions (like I-V-vi-IV) and various 6th and 7th chords. I don't think that's a bad thing, per se, but I feel trapped using my current methods. Do you have any advice on how to venture into implementing more chords like suspended, diminished, augmented, and added/omitted tones?

     that list of 'types' is not going going to get you anywhere musical. everything about the way that's listed is misleading. if your goal is to get to that list, then just put each one on paper and hang it on the wall. but if you are looking for new sounds, i'd say listen to a lot of music, and whenever you hear something you like, make sure to figure out basically how to execute everything that occurs in it. over time you will surely absorb a lot of tricks and techniques

2.22.19  8:26 am   Where can i get some motivation to work?

     motivation grows on trees

2.22.19  7:24 am   Am I crazy?

     you can be

2.22.19  1:56 am   in steps, how do i achieve true existence

     step 1 already happened, and i don't know what it is. step 2 is happening now, and i don't know what that is either. and step 3 will happen in the future and i don't know what that is either

2.22.19  1:00 am   How did you feel when your old platform (Vine) was shut down?

     relatively indifferent because i had mostly transitioned away from it 1 year earlier

2.22.19  12:18 am   Do you have any advice on how to express myself creatively without feeling the nagging anxiety that what I'm working on is going to wind up being terrible?

     anyone who has ever done anything good has had this feeling many times

2.21.19  11:55 pm   I REALLY HATE MATH AND I WANT TO BE DONE WITH IT SO I CAN CREATE SOME CONTENT BECAUSE I REALLY WANT TO CREATE SOME CONTENT BUT MY MATH IS GETTING IN THE WAY OF ME BEING ABLE TO DO SOME CONTENT

     i am curioius to see how this turns out

2.21.19  10:53 pm   let's say you have a seed, and instead of giving it water,  you give it capitalism, what do you think it'll bloom into?

     a revolt against capitalism

2.21.19  9:56 pm    so my forms of expression are really just toys. don't tell me it may be both. pretty sure they're just toys. i play the clean up song in my head when i put the stuff away. what if i called the things i actually need to do toys as well so everything appears equally as a useless tool for self-indulgence? 

     that would be useful

2.21.19  9:00 pm   What do you think about the feeling of knowing you'll never be able to accomplish everything you want to because life is only so long, yet still procrastinating on everything? Because I sure don't know how to cope.

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

2.21.19  8:30 pm   Ever experienced lucid dreaming? 

     doing it now

     trying to get some brownie points

2.21.19  7:03 pm   ok i thought about your content some more and what it means, i've concluded that you put together things that are good, for the purpose of being good, and you try to extend this abstract goodness into every aspect of the content, am i getting it now?

     yes

2.21.19  6:52 pm   How can you spend time on the internet and somehow still be original enough to be considered a staple of internet culture?

     you could try sawing a boat in half

     sure

     the world ended and started again

2.21.19  4:45 pm   Will you mention velcro in a future episode of wfaoie

     it is likely

      i want to know if i am using a good resource

2.21.19  4:03 pm   Any advice on how to get out of the procrastination loop? I have plenty of ideas when it comes to music but I never get around doing it...

     this is nature's way of figuring out who really really really really really wants to succeed. if that's you, then you're in for a treat

2.21.19  2:06 pm   Why do you censor stuff, the https://billwurtz.com/songpick20140119.png kind of censor?

     those would be songs that are not recorded yet. wouldn't want to get 'antzed' or 'titanicked'

2.21.19  1:23 pm   Approximately how many hours until your new song is released?

     a trillion

2.21.19  1:22 pm   Do u think u will ever be able to write and record an entire song along with a music video in one day?

     sure, especially if i make it crappy

2.21.19  1:21 pm   do you think one can develop perfect pitch?

     you can do it if you're a small child, but it might be a huge distraction from music. assuming you mean 'absolute pitch' and not 'a perfect sense of pitch.' 'a perfect sense of pitch' will never be a distraction from music, that would actually be a great asset to music and you don't necessarily need to be a small child to find that

2.21.19  1:20 pm   Is the writing process different than the recording/editing process?

     yes

      Specifically, are your songs fully written and charted out before you start tracking,

     yes

      or do the songs evolve while you are recording them?

     yes

      Also, nice job.

2.21.19  1:19 pm   Do you have a ritual for getting into the zone? 

     i have some but they're not good enough

2.21.19  11:51 am   Thoughts on pakistan?

     there used to be 2 pakistans and they both used to be india

2.21.19  11:45 am   How long does it usually take to make one of the full length music videos with all of the insane editing? 

     it normally takes about 8 to 10 weeks. but in september 2018 i suffered a massive mid life crisis and decided to break the universe and do them in 2 weeks. it was the best thing that ever happened to me but then i realized i need non song content too, and i am completely unwilling to reduce the song schedule. so, as pandemonium ensues in the company, further advancements are being developed

2.21.19  9:01 am   any tips on how not to suck in handwritten notation and get the job done fast

     write the heads first and don't make them too big. almost just like small diagonal lines. but also just experience will make you better. also very important, use mechanical pencils, not sharpenable pencils

2.21.19  6:57 am   How can i get to know myself?

     build something together

     the more i think about it the more i realize they are the same thing
